sentences.en: And Azubah died; and Caleb took Ephrath to himself, and she bore him Hur.
sentences.cn: 19阿苏巴死了, 迦勒又娶以法他, 以法他给他生了户珥.

sentences.en: And Hur begat Uri, and Uri begat Bezaleel.
And Hur begot Uri, and Uri begot Bezaleel.
And when Azubah was dead, Caleb took unto him Ephrath, which bare him Hur.
sentences.cn: 19阿苏巴死了, 迦勒又娶以法她, 生了户珥.

sentences.en: But with all its spectacle and pageantry, Ben - Hur is a story of people.
sentences.cn: 通过那些华丽的画面, 宾虚要讲述的是人的故事.
嘿嘿 —— 压碎他们的脑袋!

sentences.en: Hur! Just like to make a promise and then forget it.
sentences.cn: 哼! 让你把这事搞得一团糟.

sentences.en: Rephaiah son of Hur , ruler of a half - district of Jerusalem, repaired the next section.
sentences.cn: 其次是管理耶路撒冷一半,户珥的儿子利法雅修造.

sentences.en: The descendants of Judah: Perez, Hezron, Carmi , Hur and Shobal.
sentences.cn: 1犹大的儿子是法勒斯, 希斯仑, 迦米, 户珥,朔巴.

sentences.en: The sons of Judah; Pharez, Hezron, and Carmi , and Hur , and Shobal.
sentences.cn: 犹大的儿子是法勒斯, 希斯仑, 迦米, 户珥,朔巴.

sentences.en: To scenes of pageantry and revelry, Ben - Hur stuns with the impact of and thundering action.
sentences.cn: 在那些隆重的场面,狂欢的盛况中, 宾虚>的精彩动作场面会让你震撼.

sentences.en: When Azubah died, Caleb married Ephrath, who bore him Hur.
sentences.cn: 代上2:19阿苏巴死了 、 迦勒又娶以法他 、 生了户珥.

sentences.en: Yet, when Ben - Hur saved his life , he became a staunch and grateful friend.
sentences.cn: 但在获救之后, 他心怀谢意,成了宾虚忠实的朋友.
